text: Andrzej Krzepiński (born 17 July 1963) is a Polish rower. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw
title: Andrzej Krzepiński
